terms.title: Introduction
contents: By using this service, you agree to the terms of use. Please read them carefully before accessing or using the service.
This service is designed to help entrepreneurs manage their finances and sports activities. Its use is subject to the conditions set out below.

terms.title: Acceptance of Terms
contents: By accessing or using this service, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the service.

We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page. Your continued use of the service after such modifications constitutes your acceptance of said modifications.

terms.title: Use of Service
contents: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login information.
You agree not to use the service for illegal or unauthorized purposes.
You agree not to access the source code of the service or modify it in any way.
You agree not to use the service for any activity that could harm the security or integrity of the service or any other computer system.

terms.title: User Data
contents: You retain ownership of all data you enter or upload to the service.
We will not claim any ownership rights to your data.
You consent to our use of your data to provide and improve the service, as well as for analytical and marketing purposes.

terms.title: Limitation of Liability
contents: We will not be liable for direct, indirect, incidental, special or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use the service.
We do not guarantee that the service will be error-free or uninterrupted.

terms.title: Applicable Law
contents: These terms are governed by the laws in force in your country of residence.
Any dispute arising from these terms will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the competent courts of your country of residence.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: Your privacy is important to us. This privacy policy describes the types of information that [Company Name] ("we", "our", "us") may collect from you or that you provide to us when you use our service, and how we use, protect, and disclose such information. By using the service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

collectedInformation.title: Information Collected
collectedInformation.description: We may collect different types of information when you use our service, including:
contents: Personal identification information such as your name, email address, phone number, and billing information when you register to use our service.
Business information such as company name, address, and other financial information necessary for managing your finances.
Sports activity information such as types of activities performed, duration and intensity of exercise.

informationUsage.title: Use of Information
informationUsage.description: We use the information we collect to:
contents: Provide, maintain, and improve our service.
Personalize your experience and respond to your individual needs.
Process your financial transactions and provide you with financial tracking.
Track and analyze usage trends and user preferences.
Send you administrative information such as account alerts, service updates, or service-related communications.

informationProtection.title: Information Protection
informationProtection.description: The security of your information is important to us. We implement appropriate security measures to protect information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.description: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary for the purposes for which it was collected and in accordance with legal requirements.

policyChanges.title: Privacy Policy Changes
policyChanges.description: We reserve the right to update or modify this privacy policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

WelcomeFollowUpEmail.preview: How are you getting on with your new platform?
WelcomeFollowUpEmail.title: How are things going?
WelcomeFollowUpEmail.message: It's been 24 hours since you joined our platform! We hope everything is going well and that you're starting to discover all the available features.

tips.title: Here are some tips to get you started:
tips.tip1: Explore your dashboard to get an overview
tips.tip3: Don't hesitate to check out our documentation

WelcomeFollowUpEmail.support: If you have any questions or need help, our support team is here to assist you. Just reply to this email!
WelcomeFollowUpEmail.footer: You are receiving this email because you signed up on our platform with the address {email}.
